author: siladu
content: Seems like this network went up and down outside of APAC working hours. Someone mentioned an empty block issue but not sure if it's possible to investigate that now?

author: gtrintinalia
content: The ‘empty blocks’ issue on shadow forks is probably due to the pool being disabled because Besu is seeing two chains. Had the same problem on Holesky shadow fork and it was solved by using the required block to start Besu
